    Roles

    UX/UI Design

    Responsive Design

    Brief
    The client company produce films and audiovisual content for major broadcasters, creative agencies, international organisations and government. The design must be slick, simple and have a cinematic in approach. Black & White scheme, with a hint of color would be preferred.

    Approach
    The major challenge with the design was to give it a cinematic approach while keeping it simple. Therefore the hero area includes an video player of compnay's projects compilation. The rest of the website is made simple and easy to use with big sections for each categories. design was also given
